column4: anyone know how to remedy painfully slow SATA transfer speeds?  A lot of talk via google and nothing in the way of a fix that I've seen.
hmm.. slow sata.. any weird hardware involved?
i"ve tried setting the BIOS to ATA mode from AHCI mode, that doesn't seem to fix it.  I'm only recently noticing it after patching an 8.04 system (yesterday).
I've never really messed with the sata/pata system, it's the one thing that has always just worked for me
